<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ceaseless Shadows](/Feats.aspx?ID=64) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Halfling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=87" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 53 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Distracting Shadows](/Feats.aspx?ID=52)

</column>

---

You excel at going unnoticed, especially among a crowd. You no longer need to have cover or be [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) to [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62) or [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=63). If you would have lesser cover from creatures, you gain cover and can [Take Cover](/Actions.aspx?ID=90), and if you would have cover from creatures, you gain greater cover.
name: Ceaseless Shadows
